attributes.action: Keep all gyms open throughout a national lockdown!
attributes.additional_details:
The gyms are some of the safest places and the cleanest places since they reopened in July, there has been a minimal infection rate increase within gym settings and it makes no sense for them to close! They are essential whereas a lot of other companies being left open are not eg. Takeaways! 

Keep the gyms open during national lockdown!
attributes.background: The gyms help so many people not just physically but mentally! If the gyms close a lot of people will lose that and their mental health will suffer massively!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Keep gyms and leisure facilities open during any lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556956

Prevent gyms closing due to a spike in Covid 19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333869

The Committee will be holding a debate on Covid-19 restrictions on gyms and sport on Monday 23 November. You will be able to watch the debate on Parliament TV at 4.30pm: https://www.parliamentlive.tv/Commons
